job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Tesla is bringing disruption to two major industries, Energy and Transportation and providing a consistent and reliable Storage and Data platform plays a crucial role in achieving Company mission. Our team is responsible to deliver always running storage infrastructure so that Tesla can design, build and support its world class products. In this crucial role, you will work with various engineering, devops and product management teams to design a robust, highly available and scalable storage platform to ensure 100 % availability for our engineering, manufacturing and IT applications.
   What You'll Do
     * Responsible for architecture design and maintenance of Next Generation Distributed Storage, including distributed block storage, object storage, file storage etc.
     * Ensure the architecture to meet SDS (Software Defined Storage) scenarios, HCI scenarios and hybrid cloud scenarios.
     * Responsible for the development of Reference Architectures and technology standards based on Infrastructure Building Blocks, that can be offered as services to our internal customers
     * Demonstrate a high level of technical expertise to support complex Storage & Backup devices, including SAN, NAS and Backup solutions across all tiers, under minimal supervision
     * Responsible for the design, implementation, security and availability of Storage, Backups and SAN infrastructure, based on business requirements while adhering to tight operations, security, and procedural models
     * Operate in complex, highly-secure, highly-available, operations-centric datacenter environments and interact with other technology domain experts as required, to build and maintain the Storage and Backups solutions in those datacenter environments
     * Responsible for complex provisioning, advanced maintenance, data replication, disaster recovery, data migration and documentation for our Storage and Backup environments
     * Write technical design and build documentation for storage infrastructure
     * Responsible for technology strategy, engineering standards, methodologies, task-plans and best practices for Storage Engineering.
